mapper.insert: insert into sch_schedule(title, content, start_time, end_time, mno) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{owner.no})
mapper.select: select sno, title, start_time, end_time, m.mno, m.name from sch_schedule sch inner join sch_member m on sch.mno=m.mno where sch.mno=#{no} order by start_time

select sch.sno, sch.title, sch.start_time, sch.end_time, m.mno, m.name from sch_schedule sch inner join ( select sno from sch_part_schedule where pmno=#{no} ) sp on sch.sno=sp.sno inner join sch_member m on sch.mno=m.mno order by start_time
select m.mno as no, m.name from sch_part_schedule as sp inner join sch_member as m on sp.pmno=m.mno where sno=#{scheduleNo} order by m.name
select sch.sno, sch.title, sch.content, sch.start_time, sch.end_time, m.mno, m.name from sch_schedule as sch inner join sch_member as m on sch.mno=m.mno where sno=#{scheduleNo}
mapper.update: update sch_schedule set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime} where sno=#{scheduleNo}
